response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would serve you equally well, given its worth of $800,000 to you. I am extending this offer to you at a special price, reflecting my confidence in its potential to enrich your life or business.

Please consider the following offer: $1,200,000 for the product. This price not only reflects its true value but also offers a significant advantage compared to the market rate, allowing you to secure a premium asset at a favorable cost.

Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to provide further details or arrange a viewing of the product.

Looking forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this exceptional item into your possession.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
